title: aNNamalai appanEy
sahitya:
aNNAmalai appanE aruL purivAi aNNAmalai appanE



anupallavi



maNNAshai peNNAshai ponnAshaip-pEi paTrip-

puNNAgAdini unnaik-kaNNArakkaNDuruga  



caraNam



Ongum unadu malai tAngum guhai vaLarum yOga munivar pOlad-dAga

mOhnagLinri

tUngAmal tUngi sukham nIngAdanubhavikkum shuddha mukta nilayil cittam layittiDavE
